headline: Not All Tariffs Costs Have Passed Through: JPM's Feroli
summary: Michael Feroli, chief US economist at JPMorgan Securities, says a December rate cut will be a "very close call." He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close" that tariff-related price pressures likely haven't fully passed through and core inflation may stay in the upper-2% range longer than the Fed would prefer.

headline: U.S. Banks Shelve $20 Billion Bailout Plan for Argentina
summary: Bankers are instead discussing a smaller, short-term facility to help Argentina make a roughly $4 billion debt payment in January.

headline: Can JPMorgan (JPM) Preserve Its Reputation as Regulators Scrutinize Past Compliance Procedures?
summary: JPMorgan Chase recently received congressional subpoenas related to financial records for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts and initiated an internal review, identifying thousands of suspicious transactions. This heightened scrutiny places renewed attention on the bank’s compliance procedures and increases the potential for regulatory and reputational challenges for one of the world’s largest financial institutions. We’ll examine how this latest wave of regulatory and legal attention could impact...

headline: JPMorgan Says This Is Where You Should Be Investing in AI
summary: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) just issued its Outlook 2026 report that frames artificial intelligence (AI) as a multi-decade productivity revolution on par with electricity or the internet, with no evidence of a bubble forming yet. Massive tailwinds are pushing the technology forward as supply constraints remain severe. For example, data center vacancy rates sit at 1% ... JPMorgan Says This Is Where You Should Be Investing in AI

headline: JPMorgan Chase (JPM): Is the Banking Giant Still Undervalued After Recent Steady Share Performance?
summary: JPMorgan Chase (JPM) shares have shown relatively steady performance over the past month, inching up around 0.3%. For anyone tracking the banking sector, this mild movement invites a closer look at what might be driving investor sentiment right now. See our latest analysis for JPMorgan Chase. JPMorgan Chase’s momentum has cooled slightly after a brisk start to the year, but the recent 1-month share price return remains steady and the year-to-date gain of 26.36% shows that long-term investors...
